channel.title: Bio on Matthieu Jimenez Website

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello everyone, On this page you will find all relevant information about me. For more detailed information, I invite you to visit my Linkedin Since October 2014, I’m a PhD student in the Serval team of the SnT Interdisciplinary Centre at the University of Luxembourg. I am also a teaching assistant at the FSTC(Faculty of Science, Technology and Communication ) of the University of Luxembourg. My research interests are Vulnerability Prediction Models and Natural Language Processing.
